title: Presentation of Annual Administrative and the Accounts Report of Sri Jayawardenepura General Hospital in Parliament
decision_details: - Sri Jayawardenepura General Hospital has completed 25 years of service to the public by 2009.  It has  commenced Geriatric Clinic in 2009, which is the first such clinic established in the country and a Diabetic Clinic also has been started in the same year.  A new CT Scanner Machine has been installed in the Hospital in the same year.  With the provision of new facilities in the hospital, patient care services in the hospital has increased considerably.  The above Report presented by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, was approved by the Cabinet for presentation in Parliament.
